## ./docs ##

```{r, include=FALSE}

files <- grep(pattern = "*.pdf", x = dir(), value = TRUE)
finfo <- file.info(files)
finfo[, c("size", "mtime")]

url <- "[%s](./docs/%s)"
fls <- rownames(finfo)
x <- sprintf(url, fls, fls)
tb <- data.frame(Arquivo = x,
                 Tamanho = paste(finfo$size/10^3, "bytes"),
                 Modificado = finfo$mtime)

```
